old:
ん、なになに？
呼んだ？
column2: Hmm, what is it? Did you call me?
speaker: Anna

old: さーて、どうしよっかな
speaker: Anna

old:
ねぇねぇ～
何かおいしい話、知らない？
column2: Hey, hey~ Do you know any interesting stories?
speaker: Anna

old:
あーあ
どっかにすんごいお宝、転がってないかなぁ
そしたらセルマの姐さんに見直してもらえるのに
column2: Oh dear. I wonder if there might be an amazing treasure hidden somewhere. If so, Sister Selma could take another look at it for me.
speaker: Anna
